Kaela and I spent our spring break in Bishop, CA climbing and car camping with our friends [Ethan](https://www.instagram.com/ethan.ramsey47/), [Ruby](https://www.instagram.com/rubygonda/), [Joey](https://www.instagram.com/joey.cusenza/), and [Maija](https://www.instagram.com/mai.jah/).

## Lake Sabrina

I bought some snowshoes at the Mammoth Gear Exchange for 15 dollars and decided to take a rest day from climbing. I drove up to Aspendell and snowshoed to Lake Sabrina!

::: {.figure-container}
<span class="badge bg-info">Mon, 24 Mar 2025, 11:30:20 AM PDT</span>
![Lake Sabrina still frozen.](spring_8.JPG){group="spring-break"}
:::
